content: SPX-L X-Change module (inch) Ultimate X-Change module for coring in all types of concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Equidist technology (1 3/8 diameter and above) â€“ precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Unique Hilti X-Change module system (2 to 8 diameter) enables easy core removal, fast stuck core bit recovery and on-site retipping using just a flat-tip screwdriver Designed for the most challenging conditions, the core bit excels in concrete with a high rebar content Save significant space and weight by replacing traditional core bits with a single barrel and multiple modules (X-Change module) The X-Change barrel can be used for the life of multiple modules Applications Rig-based wet coring in all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 120, DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160 Base materials: Concrete Drilling Mode: Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 120, DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160 | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Laser welded segments | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2159180 -
